overview: HardWork is called that because its three scenes feature carpenters and builders. But that’s just a theme. There’s no dialogue or plot to hold up the action. These fuckers drop the tools of their trade about as quickly as they drop their jeans. And they’re some mighty special guys. The stunning men of MSR (MSR 022): HardWork include the three new TitanMen exclusives who busted your balls in Big Muscle. Dangerously explosive Chuck Scott and muscle stud Tober Brandt are pure combustion when paired together for the first time, and tattooed, wild 'n wooly Logan Steele gobbles up cocky Dereck Hanson. Getta load of the juicy knob on this guy’s shaft!
title: Hard Work
